thread.title: Paul Reubens to reprise Batman character on "Gotham"
thread.title_full: Paul Reubens to reprise Batman character on "Gotham" - CBS News

author: Andrea Park CBS News
title: Paul Reubens to reprise Batman character on "Gotham"
text:
He might be best known for playing Pee-wee Herman, but wWe always knew Paul Reubens had a sinister streak, didn't we?
The "Pee-wee's Playhouse" star will play the father of Batman's nemesis, the Penguin, on Fox's "Gotham."
Reubens will play dad to actor Robin Lord Taylor's Penguin, but there's a cool twist: This isn't the first time Reubens has stepped into Gotham as the Penguin's father. Taylor is very excited: He tweeted a poster of himself with Reubens and wrote, "Big news: Paul Reubens will be playing Penguin's father in @Gotham. Unreal. I have the best tv parents. Legends."
Big news: Paul Reubens will be playing Penguin's father in @Gotham . Unreal. I have the best tv parents. Legends. pic.twitter.com/45v6iiks4y
â€” Robin Lord Taylor (@robinlordtaylor) October 11, 2015 Reubens also played the role in 1992's "Batman Returns," so it's safe to say he knows what he's doing.
